Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, west of the Iilandi University.
Room.LongDescription: The large Iilandi University has long been known as the best learning institution in the lands. The great people of the lands come to teach here not for gold, but for prestige. Since most are already rich, there isn't much of a need to pay them more gold.
